Bewan iBox A5200

front.div:
Bewan iBox A5200 is a future proof home gateway that
off ers an unparalleled range of value added services.

«All-in-one» home gateway
Designed to fulfi l the needs of Internet
Service Providers for tailored and
modular residential gateways, the
Bewan iBox A5200 is a DSL multi-play
solution that provides users with
Broadband Internet, Wireless 802.11N
access point, IP Telephony, IPTV and
Fixed Mobile Convergence (FMC).
The Bewan iBox A5200 is the market's
most innovative multiple play gateway
as it features Bewan HomeCenter, a
groundbreaking web application that
provides a full range of multimedia
services that can be hosted on the
ISP's servers or at the user's home,
simply by connecting a USB disk to
one of the iBox's USB 2.0 ports. The
wide array of Digital Home services
includes File sharing (Photo, video,
music), Home Automation as well as
Home Surveillance (with IP cameras
and sensors), etc.
Fully customizable fi rmware
Bewan's R&D department fully masters
DSL, Wi-Fi, VoIP, IPTV, 3G technologies
to ensure a full control of the fi rmware
development. Bewan meets the major
telecom standards and answer the
specifi c needs of operators for fully
customized solutions.
With the R&D department based in
France, Bewan guarantees a direct
relationship with ISPs' technical teams
with neither cultural gaps or time zone
issue.
